name: Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos
name_original: Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos
description:
Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos is a RPG game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 01-09-1993. It was published by Virgin Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos is available on PC.
Rick Gush produced the game. It was scored by Dwight Okahara, Frank Klepacki and Paul Mudra.
